rationale: The species has been assessed as Critically Endangered as data comparing the situation in 2000 and 2009 suggest a very strong decline (greater than 80%) in the abundance of this species (J. Freyhof, unpub. data). Further declines are expected to occur as several dams are being constructed within the species range, and it is susceptible to electro-fishing, and it is impacted by silatation caused by forest clearance and degradation.
evaluator: Kottelat, M., Kullander, S.O., Rainboth, W., Ng, H.H. & Allen, D.J.
